feed.title: Google Cloud: Eventarc
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Eventarc

entry.content: Eventarc Advanced support for publishing events from multiple projects is available in Preview.
entry.summary: Eventarc now supports publishing events from multiple projects, a feature that is currently in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Eventarc supports publishing events from multiple projects

entry.summary: Eventarc Advanced is now generally available.
entry.title: Announcement: Eventarc Advanced GA

entry.content: Eventarc Advanced is available in the asia-south1 (Mumbai, India), europe-north1 (Hamina, Finland), and us-east4 (Ashburn, Virginia, North America) regions.
entry.summary: Eventarc Advanced is now available in new regions.
entry.title: Changed: Eventarc Advanced regions

entry.content: There is a limit of one MessageBus resource per project per region, and a limit of one GoogleApiSource resource per project per region. For more information, see Quotas and limits.
entry.summary: There is a limit of one MessageBus resource per project per region, and a limit of one GoogleApiSource resource per project per region.
entry.title: Changed: Quotas and limits for Eventarc resources
